DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioavailability of Bicalutamide 50 mg tablet and Casodex following a 50 mg dose in healthy subjects under fed conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study of Bicalutamide 50 mg Tablet and Casodex Following a 50 mg Dose in Healthy Subjects Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
